about.summary: A super-fast templating language that borrows the best ideas from the existing templating languages.

name: mako
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "Mako" %}
{% set version = "1.0.6" %}
{% set checksum = "48559ebd872a8e77f92005884b3d88ffae552812cdf17db6768e5c3be5ebbe0d" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ checksum }}

build:
  preserve_egg_dir: True
  entry_points:
    - mako-render=mako.cmd:cmdline
  script: python setup.py install
  number: 0

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - markupsafe >=0.9.2
  run:
    - python
    - markupsafe >=0.9.2

test:
  imports:
    - mako
    - mako.ext
  commands:
    - mako-render --help

about:
  home: http://www.makotemplates.org/
  license_file: LICENSE
  license: MIT
  summary: A super-fast templating language that borrows the best ideas from the existing templating languages.
  doc_url: http://docs.makotemplates.org/en/latest/
  dev_url: https://bitbucket.org/zzzeek/mako/src

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - Korijn
    - pmlandwehr

about.summary: A super-fast templating language that borrows the best ideas from the existing templating languages.
